concepts.definition: An infectious disease caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis affecting primarily the lungs
concepts.patient_explanation: A contagious disease that mainly affects the lungs and spreads through the air when infected people cough

cultural_considerations.stigma: High stigma in many communities; confidentiality is crucial
cultural_considerations.treatment: Long treatment duration requires cultural support systems

ur.patient_friendly: پھیپھڑوں کی ایک متعدی بیماری جو کھانسی سے پھیلتی ہے
ur.cultural_notes: اس بیماری میں سماجی رسوائی کا خطرہ ہے

es.patient_friendly: Una enfermedad contagiosa que afecta principalmente los pulmones
es.cultural_notes: Enfermedad con estigma social; requiere apoyo familiar

concepts.definition: An acute diarrheal infection caused by ingestion of contaminated water or food
concepts.patient_explanation: A dangerous illness causing severe diarrhea and dehydration from contaminated water

cultural_considerations.prevention: Clean water access and sanitation are critical
cultural_considerations.treatment: Oral rehydration therapy must be culturally explained

bn.patient_friendly: দূষিত পানি থেকে হওয়া মারাত্মক ডায়রিয়া রোগ
bn.cultural_notes: পরিষ্কার পানি ও স্যানিটেশন অত্যন্ত গুরুত্বপূর্ণ

concepts.definition: The state of carrying a developing embryo or fetus within the female body
concepts.patient_explanation: The time when a baby is growing inside a woman's body

fa.patient_friendly: زمانی که کودک در شکم مادر رشد می‌کند
fa.cultural_notes: معاینات باید توسط پزشک زن انجام شود

so.patient_friendly: Wakhtiga uu ilmuhu ku korayo caloosha hooyadiis

concepts.patient_explanation: Regular health checkups during pregnancy to keep mother and baby healthy

cultural_considerations.access: May be unfamiliar concept; importance needs explanation
cultural_considerations.frequency: Regular visits may conflict with cultural practices

concepts.definition: A serious, unexpected, and potentially dangerous situation requiring immediate action
concepts.patient_explanation: A very serious health problem that needs help right away

cultural_considerations.decision: Family involvement in emergency decisions varies

ar.patient_friendly: حالة صحية خطيرة تحتاج إلى مساعدة فورية

es.patient_friendly: Un problema de salud grave que necesita ayuda inmediata

fr.patient_friendly: Un problème de santé grave nécessitant une aide immédiate
